message.content:
cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DL. 

The paper focuses on improving retrieval performance through a context-aware neural ranking model, which is a common topic in information retrieval (IR) research. Therefore, cs.IR is the most likely sub-category. The paper also introduces a two-level hierarchical recurrent neural network, which involves natural language processing (NLP) techniques, suggesting cs.CL as the second likely sub-category. The paper also mentions attention mechanisms, which are commonly used in deep learning (DL) research, suggesting cs.LG and cs.DL as likely sub-categories. Finally, the paper involves optimizing two companion retrieval tasks, which is a common topic in artificial intelligence (AI) research, suggesting cs.AI as a likely sub-category.
